tools.one_line_profile: AutoGBT implementation using LightGBM and Optuna
tools.detailed_description: An experimental Python package that implements automated Gradient Boosting Tree (AutoGBT) training using LightGBM and Optuna for hyperparameter tuning.

tools.name: xfeat
tools.one_line_profile: Feature Engineering & Exploration Library
tools.detailed_description: A flexible feature engineering and exploration library that leverages GPUs and Optuna for efficient feature generation and selection.

tools.name: pydes
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective Stochastic Bayesian Optimization solver
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation for Multi-objective Stochastic Bayesian Optimization that quantifies uncertainties on the Pareto Frontier.

tools.name: ExaGO
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance power grid optimization
tools.detailed_description: A high-performance computing framework for solving stochastic, security-constrained, and multi-period ACOPF (Alternating Current Optimal Power Flow) problems in power grids.

tools.name: neuromancer
tools.one_line_profile: Differentiable programming for constrained optimization and system ID
tools.detailed_description: A PyTorch-based framework for solving parametric constrained optimization problems, physics-informed system identification, and parametric model predictive control.

tools.name: MOBOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-objective Bayesian optimization library
tools.detailed_description: A Python library dedicated to Multi-objective Bayesian Optimization (MOBO), facilitating the optimization of multiple conflicting objectives.

tools.name: bopp
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Optimization for Probabilistic Programs
tools.detailed_description: A Clojure library for performing Bayesian Optimization on probabilistic programs, integrating probabilistic modeling with optimization.

tools.name: Adaptive
tools.one_line_profile: Parallel active learning of mathematical functions
tools.detailed_description: Adaptive is a library for parallel active learning of mathematical functions. It provides tools to sample functions intelligently, focusing on areas of interest to minimize the number of evaluations required, which is particularly useful for expensive simulations.

tools.name: btrack
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian multi-object tracking for biological imaging
tools.detailed_description: btrack is a Python library for Bayesian multi-object tracking, specifically designed for reconstructing trajectories in complex biological imaging data. It uses a Bayesian belief matrix to link detections into tracks.

tools.name: rsopt
tools.one_line_profile: Configuration and execution framework for black-box optimization
tools.detailed_description: rsopt is a framework for the flexible configuration and execution of large, black-box optimization problems, particularly suited for physics simulations and scientific computing workflows.

tools.name: CUTEst
tools.one_line_profile: Testing environment for optimization software
tools.detailed_description: CUTEst (Constrained and Unconstrained Testing Environment with safe threads) is a versatile testing environment for optimization software, providing a large collection of test problems for evaluating optimization algorithms.

tools.name: egobox
tools.one_line_profile: Efficient global optimization toolbox in Rust
tools.detailed_description: egobox is a Rust toolbox for efficient global optimization, featuring Bayesian optimization, mixture of Gaussian processes, and sampling methods (LHS). It provides a Python binding for integration into scientific workflows.

tools.name: bocoel
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Optimization for evaluating LLMs
tools.detailed_description: bocoel (Bayesian Optimization as a Coverage Tool for Evaluating LLMs) is a library designed to optimize the evaluation of Large Language Models using Bayesian Optimization techniques to efficiently explore the model's performance landscape.

tools.name: limbo
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight framework for Bayesian optimization
tools.detailed_description: limbo is a C++11 lightweight framework for Gaussian processes and Bayesian optimization, designed to be flexible and fast for optimizing black-box functions, particularly in robotics and control.

tools.name: autolgbm
tools.one_line_profile: AutoML tool for LightGBM with Optuna tuning
tools.detailed_description: autolgbm is an AutoML tool that automates the training and hyperparameter tuning of LightGBM models using Optuna. It streamlines the process of building gradient boosting models from CSV data.

tools.name: BayesOpt
tools.one_line_profile: Toolbox for Bayesian optimization and experimental design
tools.detailed_description: BayesOpt is a C++ library (with Python and Matlab interfaces) for Bayesian optimization, experimental design, and stochastic bandits, focusing on efficient optimization of black-box functions.

tools.name: pytorch_active_learning
tools.one_line_profile: Active Learning library for PyTorch
tools.detailed_description: pytorch_active_learning is a library implementing various active learning strategies for PyTorch models, designed to accompany the 'Human-in-the-Loop Machine Learning' book but serving as a standalone reference implementation.

tools.name: BlackBoxOptim.jl
tools.one_line_profile: Black-box optimization framework for Julia
tools.detailed_description: BlackBoxOptim.jl is a global optimization framework for Julia, supporting multi-objective optimization and various derivative-free algorithms like differential evolution.

tools.name: gym-anm
tools.one_line_profile: RL environments for Active Network Management in electricity grids
tools.detailed_description: gym-anm is a framework for designing Reinforcement Learning environments that model Active Network Management (ANM) tasks in electricity distribution networks, facilitating research in smart grid control.

tools.name: Dragonflye
tools.one_line_profile: Bacterial isolate genome assembly from Nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: Dragonflye is a bioinformatics pipeline for assembling bacterial isolate genomes from Nanopore long reads, automating the assembly and polishing process.

tools.name: reproblems
tools.one_line_profile: Real-world multi-objective optimization problem suite
tools.detailed_description: reproblems is a collection of real-world multi-objective optimization problems implemented in Java, serving as a benchmark suite for evaluating optimization algorithms.

tools.name: scikit-activeml
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive active learning library for Python
tools.detailed_description: scikit-activeml is a Python library for active learning, providing a wide range of query strategies and tools compatible with the scikit-learn ecosystem.

tools.name: Trieste
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian optimization toolbox built on TensorFlow
tools.detailed_description: Trieste is a Bayesian optimization toolbox built on TensorFlow, designed for optimizing expensive black-box functions. It supports multi-objective optimization, batch acquisition, and deep Gaussian processes.

tools.name: SigOpt EvalSet
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for black-box optimization
tools.detailed_description: SigOpt EvalSet is a suite of test functions and benchmarks designed to evaluate the performance of black-box optimization algorithms, providing standardized problems for research comparison.

tools.name: GENO
tools.one_line_profile: Solver for non-linear constrained and unconstrained optimization problems
tools.detailed_description: GENO (GENeric Optimization) is a solver for non-linear optimization problems that can handle both constrained and unconstrained scenarios. It automatically generates a solver instance for the specified optimization problem.

tools.name: LAMP
tools.one_line_profile: Deep learning-based surrogate model for optimizing computational cost via remeshing
tools.detailed_description: LAMP is a deep learning-based surrogate model that jointly learns the evolution model of a physical system and optimizes the computational cost via remeshing, useful for accelerating expensive simulations.

tools.name: BayesianInference
tools.one_line_profile: Wolfram Language application for Bayesian inference and Gaussian process regression
tools.detailed_description: A Mathematica application designed to perform Bayesian inference and Gaussian process regression, facilitating statistical analysis and modeling.

tools.name: NLopt
tools.one_line_profile: Library for nonlinear optimization wrapping many algorithms
tools.detailed_description: NLopt is a library for nonlinear optimization, providing a common interface for various global and local optimization algorithms, including constrained and unconstrained methods.

tools.name: STK
tools.one_line_profile: Small Toolbox for Kriging (Gaussian Processes) in MATLAB
tools.detailed_description: The STK is a MATLAB toolbox focused on Kriging (Gaussian Process regression), providing tools for interpolation, regression, and covariance function modeling.

tools.name: evolutionary-optimization
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of black-box evolutionary optimization algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A Python library providing a collection of black-box optimizers with a focus on evolutionary algorithms for optimization tasks.

tools.name: dmpbbo
tools.one_line_profile: Library for Dynamical Movement Primitives and Black-Box Optimization
tools.detailed_description: A C++/Python library combining Dynamical Movement Primitives (DMP) with Black-Box Optimization (BBO) algorithms, primarily for robotics and control tasks.

tools.name: gwsurrogate

tools.detailed_description: A Python package providing an easy-to-use interface for evaluating surrogate models of gravitational waveforms, used in astrophysics simulations.

tools.name: robustgp
tools.one_line_profile: Robust Gaussian Process with Iterative Trimming
tools.detailed_description: A library implementing Robust Gaussian Processes using iterative trimming to handle outliers in data, developed by SYRTE.

tools.name: Tea-Lang
tools.one_line_profile: DSL for experimental design and statistical analysis
tools.detailed_description: Tea is a domain-specific language that automates the selection of statistical tests and experimental designs, helping researchers conduct valid statistical analysis.

tools.name: LLAMBO
tools.one_line_profile: Large Language Models to Enhance Bayesian Optimization
tools.detailed_description: LLAMBO is a framework that leverages Large Language Models to improve the efficiency and performance of Bayesian Optimization tasks, particularly for black-box functions.

tools.name: iterate
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmarking and hyper-parameter optimization tool using TerraTorch
tools.detailed_description: A tool for benchmarking and hyperparameter optimization that integrates MLFlow, Optuna, and Ray, designed to streamline the experimental iteration process.

tools.name: sparseGP_powerEP

tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of unified sparse approximations for Gaussian process regression and classification using Power Expectation Propagation.

tools.name: IterativeLQR.jl

tools.detailed_description: A Julia package implementing the constrained iterative Linear Quadratic Regulator (iLQR) algorithm, used for optimal control and trajectory optimization.

tools.name: bayesian-optimization
tools.one_line_profile: Python library for Bayesian Optimization using Gaussian Processes
tools.detailed_description: A Python library for performing Bayesian Optimization, utilizing Gaussian Processes to optimize black-box functions.

tools.name: Test_Functions_for_Multi-objective_Optimization
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of test functions for multi-objective optimization
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB repository providing standard test functions for benchmarking multi-objective optimization algorithms.

tools.name: cspy

tools.detailed_description: A library providing algorithms to solve the Resource Constrained Shortest Path problem, applicable in network optimization and operations research.

tools.name: COMBO

tools.detailed_description: A Python library for Bayesian optimization designed to be easy to use for scientific applications, supporting various acquisition functions and kernels.

tools.name: Bayesmark

tools.detailed_description: A framework to easily compare Bayesian optimization methods on real machine learning tasks and standard test functions, facilitating reproducible research in optimization.

tools.name: MOLTO-IT

tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB tool for the preliminary design of low-thrust interplanetary trajectories using multi-objective optimization techniques.

tools.name: mystic

tools.detailed_description: A framework for highly constrained non-convex optimization and uncertainty quantification, capable of handling complex constraints in scientific machine learning problems.

tools.name: benderopt
tools.one_line_profile: Black-box optimization library for hyperparameter tuning
tools.detailed_description: A library for black-box optimization, focusing on ease of use for hyperparameter optimization tasks using Parzen Estimators.

tools.name: Bayesian-Optimization
tools.one_line_profile: Bayesian Optimization algorithms with recent improvements
tools.detailed_description: A Python implementation of Bayesian Optimization containing various acquisition functions and improvements for global optimization problems.

tools.name: EasySurrogate

tools.detailed_description: Part of the VECMA toolkit, designed to facilitate the creation and usage of surrogate models for complex multiscale simulations.

tools.name: Cornell-MOE

tools.detailed_description: A robust library for Bayesian Optimization (Optimal Learning), implementing efficient algorithms for global optimization of expensive functions.

tools.detailed_description: A wrapper to facilitate distributed hyperparameter optimization using Optuna, enabling scaling of optimization tasks.

tools.name: ConvertChanceConstraint-ccc

tools.detailed_description: A toolbox for handling chance constraints in optimization problems, useful for robust design and control under uncertainty.

tools.name: rBayesianOptimization

tools.detailed_description: An R package for Bayesian Optimization of hyperparameters, supporting global optimization of black-box functions.

tools.name: GraphDot

tools.detailed_description: A platform for automated optimal experimental design, facilitating the optimization of scientific experiments through active learning and multi-objective optimization.

tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the DGEMO algorithm for efficient multi-objective optimization with batch evaluations, suitable for expensive scientific simulations.

tools.detailed_description: A Python-based tool for multi-objective optimization of district energy system operation planning. It aims to minimize operating costs and emissions under uncertainties, serving as a specialized solver for energy systems engineering.

It supports advanced features like knowledge distillation, distributed training, and hyperparameter optimization via Optuna, specifically tailored for medical imaging tasks.

While general-purpose, it provides essential infrastructure for computer vision tasks in scientific monitoring and robotics, including support for distributed training and Optuna-based optimization.

tools.name: Bayesian Optimization Algorithms (MATLAB)

tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of the Max-value Entropy Search (MES) acquisition function. It is designed for efficient Bayesian optimization, particularly useful in scenarios where evaluating the objective function is expensive.

tools.name: REMBO

tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB implementation of REMBO (Random EMbedding Bayesian Optimization), a technique designed to scale Bayesian optimization to high-dimensional parameter spaces by leveraging low-dimensional effective subspaces.
